st: Kab Kon Kisi Ka Hota Hai
s:
Kab Kon Kisi Ka Hota Hai
Sub Choote Rishtey Naate Hai
Sub Dil Rakhney Ki Batein Hai
Sub Asal Roop Chupatey Hai
Mohabbat Ke Khali Log Yaha
Lafzo Ke Teer Chalete Hai
Ek Bar Nigahon Mai Agar
Phir Sari Zindagi Rulate Hai
Woh Jis Ne Diya Hai Asshk Humey
Ab Woh Hi Hum Ko Bhool Jatey Hai

st: Mumkin Ho Apse To Bhula Dijiye Ga Mujhe
s:
Mumkin Ho Apse To Bhula Dijiye Ga Mujhe
Pathar Pe Hon Lakeer Mita Digiye Ga Mujhe
Har Roz Mujh Se Hai Taza Sikayat Apko
Main Kiya Hon Ek Bar Bata Digiye Ga Mujhe

st: Aankh pyasi hai koi manzar de
s:
Aankh pyasi hai koi manzar de
is jazire ko bhi samandar de
apana chehara talash karana hai
gar nahi aaina to patthar de
band kaliyon ko chahiye shabanam
in chiragon mein roshani bhar de
pattharon ke saron se karz utar
is sadi ko koi payambar de
kahkahon mein guzar rahi hai hayat
ab kisi din udas bhi kar de
phir na kahana ke khudkhushi hai gunah
aj fursat hai faisala kar de

st: Jinki Yaad Hai Dil Me Nishaani Ki Tarah
s:
Jinki Yaad Hai Dil Me Nishaani Ki Tarah
Woh To Bhool Gaye Hume Kahani Ki Tarah

st: Sabhi Naghme Saz Me Gaye Nahi Jate
s:
Sabhi Naghme Saz Me Gaye Nahi Jate
Sabhi Log Mehfil Me Bulaye Nehi Jate
Kuch Pas Reh Kar Bhi Yaad Nahi Aate
Kuch Dur Rehkar Bhi Bhulaye Nahi Jate

st: Tere Bina Hum Jeena Bhool Jaate Hain
s:
Tere Bina Hum Jeena Bhool Jaate Hain
Zakhmon Ko Seena Bhool Jate Hain
Tu Zindagi Main Sabse Azeez Hai Hamain
Tujhse Har Bar Yeh Kehna Bhool Jaate Hain

st: Wo Mera Hai To Wo Mujhse Door Kyun Hain?
s:
Wo Mera Hai To Wo Mujhse Door Kyun Hain?
Door Rehkar Jeene Ko Hum Majboor Kyun Hain?
Gunah(Pyar)Hum Dono Ne Kiya Tha Ek Jaisa,
To Mera Kasoor Kyun Hai Aur Wo Bekasoor Kyun Hai..

st: Tere Khayal Se Ghafil Nahi Ho'n Teri Kasam
s:
Tere Khayal Se Ghafil Nahi Ho'n Teri Kasam
Tere Khayal Me Kuch Bhool Bhool Jata Ho'n

st: Hataaye The Jo Raaste Se Doston Ki
s:
Hataaye The Jo Raaste Se Doston Ki
Wo Patthar Mere Ghar Men Aane Lage Hain
Wahi Phir Mujhe Yaad Aane Lage Hain
Jinhen Bhulaane Men Zamaane Lage Hain
Ye Kehnaa Thaa Un Se Muhabbat Hai Mujhko
Ye Kehne Men Mujh Ko Zamaane Lage Hain
Qayaamat Yaqinan Qarib Aa gaii Hai
‘Khumar’ Ab To Masjid Men Jaane Lage Hain

st: Jiya Itna Ki Marna Muskhil Ho Gaya
s:
Jiya Itna Ki Marna Muskhil Ho Gaya
Hase Itna Ki Runa Muskil Ho Gaya
Kisiko Pana Kismat Ki Baat Hai
Chaha Itna Ki Bhulana Muskhil Ho Gaya

st: Kitabon Main Rakh K Sula Gaya Humko
s:
Kitabon Main Rakh K Sula Gaya Humko
Aankh Band Ki Or Bhula Gaya Humko
Koi Ajeeb Mussawar Tha Jo Baarishon K Mausam Mein
Kachi Deewaron Pe Bana Gaya Humko

st: Yeh Bahein Humein Jab
s:
Yeh Bahein Humein Jab
Apni Panahon Mein Bulathi Hein,
Humein Apni Kasam Hum
Har Sahara Bhool Jatey Hain…

st: Wo Jo Apna Tha Humse Hai Khafa,
s:
Wo Jo Apna Tha Humse Hai Khafa,
Pata Nahi Kis Se Huyi Thi Kya Khata,
Be-Wajah Dil Nahi Tut-Taa Kisi Ka,
Tum The Ya Hum The Bewafa

st: Kaise Kehde Ki Unse Milne Ki Chahat Nahi
s:
Kaise Kehde Ki Unse Milne Ki Chahat Nahi
Bekarar Dil Ko Ab Bhi Rahat Nahi
Bhula Dete Unhe Bhi Magar Kya Kare Dost
Kisi Ko Bhulane Ki Is Dil Ko Aadat Nahi..

st: Bun K Ajnabi Mily Thay Zindagi K Safr Mein Kahin
s:
Bun K Ajnabi Mily Thay Zindagi K Safr Mein Kahin
In Yadon K Lamhon Ko Kabhi Bhoolaingay Nahin
Agar Yaad Rakhna Fitrat Hai Aapki
Bhool Jane Ki Adat Hamain Bhi Nahin

st: Gamo Mai Bhi Muskurana Chahta Hu Mein
s:
Gamo Mai Bhi Muskurana Chahta Hu Mein
Tumhe Bhulake Ek Nayi Duniya Basana Chahta Hu Mein
Magar Na Jane Kyun Nikal Ate Hai Ashoo
Jab Bhi Tumhe Bhulana Chahta Hu Mein

st: Kis Tarah Aur Pass Aaon Main,
s:
Kis Tarah Aur Pass Aaon Main,
Sirf Apna Tumein Banaaon Main.
Paas Ho Kar Bhi Door Hain Itne,
Kis Nidaa Se Tumein Bulaaon Main.
Raat Din Be Qaraar Rehta Hoon,
Kaash, Lamhe Ka Chain Paaon Main.
Dhoop Hai Tez,Kahin Chaaon Nahin,
Abra Ko, Ab,Kahan Se Laaon Main.
Aik Lamhe Bhoola Nahin Paata,
Khoob Kehto Ho,Bhool Jaaon Mai

st: Tum Banke Dost Aise Aaye Zindagi Mein
s:
Tum Banke Dost Aise Aaye Zindagi Mein
Ki Hum Yeh Zamana Hi Bhool Gaye
Tumhen Yaad Aaye Na Aaye Hamari Kabhi
Par Hum To Tumhe Bhulana Hi Bhool Gaye

st: Tumhein Bhoolne Main Hamein Kuch Waqt Lage Ga
s:
Tumhein Bhoolne Main Hamein Kuch Waqt Lage Ga
Aur Wohi Kuch Waqt Hamari Zindagi Hai Janaa

st: Yaade Dilse Mitane Ki Cheez Nahi Hoti
s:
Yaade Dilse Mitane Ki Cheez Nahi Hoti
Zindgi Har Pal Azmane Ki Cheez Nahi Hoti
Beshak Kuch Pal Yuhi Bhula Diye Jate Hai
Par Pyar Bhool Jane Ki Cheez Nahi Hoti

st: Meri vafayen yaad karoge
s:
Meri vafayen yaad karoge
rooge, fariyad karoge
mujhko to barbad kiya hai
aur kise barbad karoge
hum bhi hansange tum par ik din
tum bhi kabhi fariyad karoge
mahafil ke mahafil hai gam-gin
kis-kis ka dil shad karoge
dushman tak ko bhool gaye ho
mujhko tum kya yaad karoge
jakar bhi nashad kiya tha
aakar bhi nashad karoge
chodo bhi ‘taseer' ke baten
kab tak us ko yaad karoge

st: Bhool Shayari Sms in Hindi
s:
Bhool Shayari Sms in Hindi
Kabhi Dil Se Muskura Kar Dekho
Humari Gazal Gunguna Kar Dekho
Hum Bhool Jayenge Aapko Ek Shart Pe
Pehle Aap Humein Bhula Kar To Dekho.

st: Bhool Se Agar Koi Bhool Howi
s:
Bhool Se Agar Koi Bhool Howi
To Bhool Samajh Kar Bhool Jana
Arey Bhoolna Sirf Bhool Ko
Bhool Kar Bhi Hamein Na Bhool Jana

st: Koi Gila Na Koi Shikwa Rahe Aapse
s:
Koi Gila Na Koi Shikwa Rahe Aapse
Ye Aarzo Hai Ek Silsila Rahe Aapse
Bus Ek Choti Si Iltija Karte Hein Hum
Bhoolna Nahi Chahe Kabhi Juda Rahe Aapse

st: Har Roz Koi Khuwaab Toot Jaata Hai
s:
Har Roz Koi Khuwaab Toot Jaata Hai
Har Roz Koi Apna Rooth Jaata Hai
Na Jany Meri Qismat Main Kya Hai
Jisay Mein Yaad Karon Wohi Mujhe Bhool Jata Hai.

st: Ruthna Mat Hume Manana Nahi Aata
s:
Ruthna Mat Hume Manana Nahi Aata
Diye Mat Jalana Bujhana Nahi Aata
Tum Bhul Jao, To Tumhari Marzi
Hamein To Yoon Bhulana Bhi Nahi Aata

st: Na Illm Tha Mohabbat Kya Cheez Hai
s:
Na Illm Tha Mohabbat Kya Cheez Hai
Na Bekarari Na Rusvayi Ka Pata Tha
Tum Kya Aaye Mere Zindagi Mein
Hum Apna Naam Tak Bhool Chuke

st: Un Se Duur Janay Ka Irada Na Tha
s:
Un Se Duur Janay Ka Irada Na Tha
Sada Sath Rehnay Ka Bhi Wada Na Tha
Wo Yaad Na Karaingay Yeh Jantay Thay Hum
Par Itni Jaldi Bhool Jayengay, Andaza Na Tha

st: Dil Se Tumhe Bhulane Ki Koshish Karenge Hum
s:
Dil Se Tumhe Bhulane Ki Koshish Karenge Hum
Tum Se Bhi Ho Sake To Na Aana Khayalon Me

st: Hum Ko Bhool Na Jana Tum
s:
Hum Ko Bhool Na Jana Tum
Yeh Kehte Hain Sab Hi
Lekin Aata Hai Waqt Kuchh Aisa
Ke Bhool Jaate Hain Khud Hi

st: Tum Bhoolna Chaho Gay Tu Yaad Aaonga Mein
s:
Tum Bhoolna Chaho Gay Tu Yaad Aaonga Mein
Aankhon Mein Ashk Chupaoogay Tu Yaad Aaaonga Mein
Yeh Khizaayein Bhi Baharoon Mein Badal Jayein Gi
Phool Par Hont Jhukaoo gay Tu Yaad Aaonga Mein
Mein ke Chun Laita Tha Palkoon se Tumhare Aansoon
Tum Kabhi Ashk Bahao Gay Tu Yaad Aaoonga Mein…

st: Apni Yaadain Apni Baatain Le Kar Jana Bhool Gaya
s:
Apni Yaadain Apni Baatain Le Kar Jana Bhool Gaya
Jane Wala Jaldi Main Mil Kar Jana Bhool Gaya
Mur Mur Kar Dekha Tha Us Ne Jate Raste Maein
Jaise Us Ne Kehna Tha Kuch Jo Wo Kehna Bhool Gaya
Waqt-E-Ruhsat Meri Aankhain Ponch Raha Tha Aanchal Se
Us Ko Ghum Tha Itna Ziada Khud Wo Rona Bhool Gaya

st: Tu Naam Ka Darya Hai Rawani Nahi Rakhta
s:
Tu Naam Ka Darya Hai Rawani Nahi Rakhta
Badal Hai Wo Bay Faiz Kay Pani Nahi Rakhta
Yeh Akhri Khat Akhri Taswee Be Lay Ja
Main Bholnay Waloon Key Nishani Nahi Rakhta

st: Wo Yaad Nhi Krte,Hum Bhula Nhi Sakte..
s:
Wo Yaad Nhi Krte,Hum Bhula Nhi Sakte..
Wo Hans Nahi Sakte,Hum Rula Nahi Sakte..
Hai Pyar Itna Khubsurat Humara,
Ki Wo Bata Nhi Sakte Or Hum Jata Nhi Sakte…

st: Tumko Bhula Payenge Itna Hum Main Dum Nahi,
s:
Tumko Bhula Payenge Itna Hum Main Dum Nahi,
Tumne Diya Jo Gam Wo Maut Se Kam Nahi,
Yaaro Dil Ke Jakhm Dikhaon Phasana Yaar Kaa Hain,
Mohabbat Jhoothi Hain Bahana Pyaar Kaa Hain

st: Aapko Bhool Jau Umar Guzarne Ki Baat Hai,
s:
Aapko Bhool Jau Umar Guzarne Ki Baat Hai,
Aap Ko Naa Ho Yakin Yeh Aur Baat Hai,
Jab Tak Rahegi Saas Tab Tak Rahonge Yaad,
Yeh Saas Tut Jaaye To Aur Baat Hai

st: Sapno Ki Tarha Aakar Chali Gayi
s:
Sapno Ki Tarha Aakar Chali Gayi
Apno Ko Bhula Kar Chali Gayi
Kis Bhool Ki Saja Di Hamein
Usne Pahele Hasaya Pir Rula Kar Chali Gayi

st: Kahan Aa Kay Ruknay Thay Rastay, Kahan Mor Tha Usay Bhol Ja
s:
Kahan Aa Kay Ruknay Thay Rastay, Kahan Mor Tha Usay Bhol Ja
Jo Mil Gaya Usay Yaad Rakh, Jo Nahi Mila Usay Bhol Ja

st: Khuda Ka Wasta Khod Ko Kam Nazar Na Karna
s:
Khuda Ka Wasta Khod Ko Kam Nazar Na Karna
Jo Tara Sath Ne De Os Ko Hamsafar Na Karna
Jo Bhi Galti Tum Se Howi So Howi
Ya Nadani Dobara Ab Umro Bar Na Karna

st: Ghamo Main Hum Hasana Bhool Gaye
s:
Ghamo Main Hum Hasana Bhool Gaye
Khushi Ka Tarana Bhool Gaye
Teri Yaad Main Aansu Bahate Bahate
Hum Ek Pal Bhi Muskurana Bhool Gaye

st: Bhoolna Tumhe Na Asaan Hoga,
s:
Bhoolna Tumhe Na Asaan Hoga,
Jo Bhule Tumhe Vo Nadan Hoga.
Aap To Baste Ho Rooh Mein Hamari,
Aap Hume Na Bhule Ye Apka Ehsan Hoga

st: Ajab Tarah Se Socha Hai Zindagi K Liye
s:
Ajab Tarah Se Socha Hai Zindagi K Liye
Zakham Zakham Likhte Hain Har Kushi K Liye
Wo Shaks Muje Bhool Gaya To Yaqeen Aya
Koi Bhi Shaks Zaroori Nahi Kisi K Liye

st: Ek Dil Ko Dil Lage Se Bachaya Na Ja Saka
s:
Ek Dil Ko Dil Lage Se Bachaya Na Ja Saka
Qismat Se Apna Aap Churaya Na Ja Saka
Hairat Hai Ke Log Kaise Khuda Ko Bhool Gaye
Hum Se To Ek Insan Bulaya Na Ja Saka

st: Hum Doston Ko Bhulate Nahi Hain
s:
Hum Doston Ko Bhulate Nahi Hain
Magar Yai Bat Jattate Nahi Hain
Doston Ki Hamesha Rekhtay Hain Yaad
Hum Bhulnay K Liye Dost Banaty Nahi Hain

st: Tum BHOOL Bhi Jao To Ye Haq He Tum Ko
s:
Tum BHOOL Bhi Jao To Ye Haq He Tum Ko
Meri Aur Baat He Mene To Muhabbat Ki He

st: Bhool Se Agar Koi Bhool Hui,
s:
Bhool Se Agar Koi Bhool Hui,
To Bhool Samajke Use Bhool Jana,
Arey Bhoolna Sirf Bhool Ko,
Bhoolkar Bhi Hume Na Bhool Jana.

st: Tujhe Bhoolkar Bhi Na Bhool Payenge Hum
s:
Tujhe Bhoolkar Bhi Na Bhool Payenge Hum
Bas Yahi Ek Wada Nibha Payenge Hum
Mita Denge Khud Ko Bhi Jahan Se Lekin
Tera Naam Dil Se Na Mita Payenge Hum

st: Suhani Raaton Ki Chandni Mein Kabhi Na Tum Be-Naqaab Aana
s:
Suhani Raaton Ki Chandni Mein Kabhi Na Tum Be-Naqaab Aana
Main Dil Pe Qaaboo To Kar Sakoon Ga Nigah Shayid Gunah Karde

st: Beetay Pal Wapas La Nahi Sakte
s:
Beetay Pal Wapas La Nahi Sakte
Sukhe Phool Wapas Khila Nahi Sakte
Kabhi Kabhi Lagta Hai Aap Hamein Bhul Gaye
Par Dil Kehta Hai K Aap Hamein Bhula Nai Sakte

st: Pal Bhar Mai Jo Toot Jaye Wo Qasam Nahi
s:
Pal Bhar Mai Jo Toot Jaye Wo Qasam Nahi
Aap Ko Bhool Jaye Wo Hum Nahi
Aap Hamein Bhool Jaye Is Baat Main Dam Nahi
Kyon Ke Aap Hamein Bhool Jao Itne Bure Hum Nahi

st: Apne Dil Ki Sun Afwahon Se Kaam Na Le
s:
Apne Dil Ki Sun Afwahon Se Kaam Na Le
Mujhe Yad Rakh Beshak Naam Na Le
Tera Veham Hai K Hum Bhool Gaye Tujhe
Meri Koi Aisi Saans Nai Jo Tera Naam Na Le

st: Aasoo Aa Jate Hain Ankhon Me Rone Se Pehle
s:
Aasoo Aa Jate Hain Ankhon Me Rone Se Pehle
Her Khwab Toot Jate Hain Sone Se Pehle
Ishq Hai Gunah Ye To Samajh Gaye
Kaash Koi Rok Leta Ye Gunah Hone Se Pehle

st: Zinda Hu Main Mgar, Jeene Ki Koshish Kr Rha Hu Main,
s:
Zinda Hu Main Mgar, Jeene Ki Koshish Kr Rha Hu Main,
Is Jeene Ki Koshish Me, Bar Bar Mar Rha Hu Main.
Jee To Skta Hu Mgar Bhool Kr Tumko.
Mar Rha Hu Bar Bar, Kyunki Tumhe Yaad Kr Rha Hu Main

st: Tujhy Bhul Jaon Ye Koshish Kr K Dakhun Ga
s:
Tujhy Bhul Jaon Ye Koshish Kr K Dakhun Ga
Wesy Daryaon Ka Ulta Behna Mumkin Nai..

st: Gamo Mai Bhi Muskurana Chahta Hu Mein
s:
Gamo Mai Bhi Muskurana Chahta Hu Mein
Ek Nayi Duniya Basana Chahta Hu Mein
Magar Na Jane Kyon Nikal Ate Hain Ansoo
Jab Bhi Tumhe Bhulana Chahta Hu Mein!

st: Apne Dil Ki Awaz Sun Afwaon Se Kaam Na Ley
s:
Apne Dil Ki Awaz Sun Afwaon Se Kaam Na Ley
Mujhe Yaad Kar Beshak Mera Naam Na Ley
Tera Weham Hai Ke Hum Bhool Gaye Tujhe
Meri Koi Sans Aisi Nahi Jo Tera Naam Na Ley

st: Jab Chla Chor K Batlane Ki Zehmat Bhi Na Ki,
s:
Jab Chla Chor K Batlane Ki Zehmat Bhi Na Ki,
Khob Tha Dosti Ek Arsa Nibhanay Wala,
Dushmani K Bhi Tu Aadaab Hain Aey Dost Bata,
Koi Itna Bhi Na Tha Tujh Ko Batanay Wala…

st: Na Jane Kis Bat Ki Wo Mujh Ko Saza Dayta Hai
s:
Na Jane Kis Bat Ki Wo Mujh Ko Saza Dayta Hai
Mere Hansti Hoye Ankhon Ko Rula Dayta Hai
Hum Ko Maloom Nahin Koye To Poocho Us Se
Kya Koye Is Tarah Apno Ko Bhula Dayta Hai

st: Waqt Kehta Hai Mujhe Gawana Mat
s:
Waqt Kehta Hai Mujhe Gawana Mat
Dil Kehta Hai Mujhe Lagana Maat
Dost Kehta Hai Mujhe Azamana Mat
Or Hum Kehta Hai Hame Bhulana Mat
